subtitle: Luscious layers of tropical fruits and creamy Greek yogurt served in sundae dishes or glasses.

method.text: Mix together the mango, strawberries, pineapple and blueberries. Pour over the liqueur. Cover. Leave in the fridge to macerate for 2-1 days.
Stir the passion fruit pulp and honey into the yogurt. Layer the fruits and yogurt alternately into tall glasses, finishing with a layer of yogurt.

title: Tropical temptation
